Hello from your Corian® Solid Surface and Corian® Quartz support team!
Congratulations! Your company, {!Account.Name}, has been selected to be an Authorized Retailer. Let us help you grow your business. We want to ensure we have the most up to date information for you so you can take advantage of all the great benefits that come with being a Corian® Design Authorized Retailer, including:
*Receive the latest communications, with updates on new products, color launches, promotions, and more. *Placement on our online retailer locator. -Many homeowners research online before visiting a showroom. Your name, address, and location will be featured. *Qualified consumer leads. -Homeowners contacting Corian® Design directly will be given the closest Corian® Design Authorized Retailer information. *Social media tips to grow your business *Preferred access to local merchandising support.
By taking this action, you will be a Corian® Design Authorized Retailer.
Please click here (http://dpscrm.force.com/BI_AuthorizationForm) to review and update your information. This will take less than two minutes. Thank you for helping keep our information current!
Questions? Please view our FAQ document or contact us at 1-800-720-7426.
Thank you for your business and your continued support of Corian® Solid Surface and Corian® Quartz!
Corian® Design Corian® Solid Surface and Corian® Quartz
